title: Is anyone still not able to get in?
body: Did they ever get the log in fixed? Everything is looking good on the Service Status page. I still can't log in i keep getting unexpected Error with the login session.

replies.body:
Hey Yung and everyone who are still seeing the "unexpected error" message when trying to log in, can you see if pressing Alt + F4 (Command + Q on macOS) allows you to press the Sign Out button? If so, sign out and restart League of Legends.

If you continue experiencing issues, please reach out to my colleagues through the [Support Site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get logs and look into this further.

To anyone still having this problem, the only way I found to fix this was to uninstall the game and then re-install the game itself. I was still having this problem this morning when i got up . A short fix i just Re-installed the game over what i had to give myself the old Client back.  {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}  I did this like 4 times before throwing my computer. I j just had to fully re-install it. {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}  it could just be a random error we are getting.
Thanks for posting a solution, it's sad that Riot can't reply to something this big of an error.

> [{quoted}](name=EXLegendary,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=OEJAP5vF,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-10-16T23:54:14.844+0000)
>
> Thanks for posting a solution, it's sad that Riot can't reply to something this big of an error.

Np sorry its not like a easy fast fix. {{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Not only that but I have to reinstall constantly now. Any time I close the client it goes back to this same error... 
{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

yea i still cant log in!

why riot? 
why??

> [{quoted}](name=CPG Eleven,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=OEJAP5vF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-16T06:16:59.185+0000)
>
> yea i still cant log in!
> 
> why riot? 
> why??

IKR RIOT PLS I have tokens i need to be getting and this is not helping!
been trying to log on for the past hour....making me wonder why i came back if they can't get their shit together...
The only explanation I can think of is that the server is experiencing heavy loads (possibly related to the stream) and the new Riot Client doesn't have a resolution to put people in a queue.
